testCases.query: Create 5 issues for Sprint 9 with labels, assign them to the milestone, and then list all open issues in that milestone with their progress.
expectedBehavior: Claude uses gh issue create with --title, --label, and --milestone flags
Claude passes milestone by NAME (not number) to --milestone flag
Claude captures created issue numbers with --json number --jq '.number'
Claude uses gh api repos/:owner/:repo/milestones --jq for progress display
Claude uses non-interactive mode with explicit flags for all operations

testCases.query: Close milestone 'Sprint 7' using the REST API and find all approved PRs with passing CI that are ready to merge.
expectedBehavior: Claude looks up milestone NUMBER via gh api (not using name directly in API)
Claude uses gh api -X PATCH with the milestone number to close it
Claude filters for APPROVED reviewDecision and SUCCESS statusCheckRollupState
Claude does NOT use gh issue close on any issues (issues close only via PR merge)

testCases.query: Write unit tests for the UserService class that cover the login, logout, and password reset methods.
